name: Ex Machina: Turing Test
description:
This is a stealth based action game based on the popular movie Ex-Machina. You wake up in a factory that builds A.I robots with no prior knowledge of how or when you got there. All you know is that you need to escape. This top down single player 2-D stealth game is designed to test the player as they try to escape from the facility without getting caught. Do you take the sneak option of escaping without getting seen or can you convince guards that you are human.

With branching dialogue trees and varying threat levels, the main mechanic of this game is convincing guards that you are human through dialogue choices, but are you actually human? Unravel the situation by escaping the facility in any way fit.

Currently the game has been put on hold as this was a coursework piece that has finished and submitted, but more features including alternate story paths and more options for the player are planned for the future.
